title: VERSHIY - BERIWO (Thank You)
seo_description: Beriwo which means “Thank You” is a an Afro-Pop with a traditional Gospel Feel. This is a form of Gospel music that is very rhythmic, melodious, and also very peaceful. It is a spiritual music rooted in the solo and responsive lead and choral singing that touches to the Soul.
description:
<!--StartFragment-->

Beriwo which means “Thank You” is a an Afro-Pop with a traditional Gospel Feel. This is a form of Gospel music that is very rhythmic, melodious, and also very peaceful. It is a spiritual music rooted in the solo and responsive lead and choral singing that touches to the Soul.

 Vershiy approaches the entire song being grateful to God for Blessing her with Love ones, and she calls on all to celebrate what God has done. 

The message is simple - Beriwo (Thank You). Written and Performed: Vershiy Produced by: Tony Eff Beats Douala Cameroon Video Director: Director Chuzih of Fan Arts Douala Cameroon.

 Executive Producer: Julius Tsi Record Label: Ablaze Music.
